page.title: 18Attitudes in North Nibley.
page.content: The people in North Nibley feel that it is a very friendly and pleasant area to live in.It is a good place to bring up a family as it is safe and healthy.There is easy access to places of work ie.Dursley and Gloucester.Many people feel that there is no need for more housing as there is no real need for further development.The lack of public transport is a more pressing need.Nibley people tend to look more to Wotton as the centre point.There is concern about the relative lack of leisure facilities for the young.Those pupils of secondary age go to Katharine Lady Berkeley School,Wotton. There is a strong W.I. movement in Nibley which endeavours to improve and promote the community way of life,and enrich the appearance of the already beautiful village.
